justification: “Participants are occasionally interrupted with thought probes that ask them to introspectively judge whether they were focused on-task or off-task in the preceding trial or series of trials.”

measured_by: Sustained Attention to Response Task (SART) performance
justification: “Almost all previous quantitative theories of mind wandering have studied performance in the sustained attention to response task (SART)… it has been widely adopted in the study of mind wandering due to its simple structure and non-arousing nature.”
“The sustained attention to response task (SART)… is a go-nogo task… originally developed to study the effect of brain injury on sustained attention.”
“After the behavioral task, participants completed the Mindful Attention Awareness Scale (MAAS; K. W. Brown & Ryan, 2003).”
